It was difficult for me to understand him, so I assumed that he was asking for money. Eventually, he managed to explain that he'd been travelling for a long time and he was hungry. I offered the man as much food and water as he could take, and I stuck a few dollars in his pocket. He thanked me and went on his way. It may not have been much help, but it was the best I could so in my own situation.
